verbose_text: As the mutation of T790M reduces the activity of EFGR inhibitors through inhibition of part of their interaction, in the resistant T790M mutant EGFR, pi cation interactions or H-bonds with residue Lys745 were present, but the H-bond between the compounds and Met790 was not.
evidence: reduces the activity of EFGR inhibitors through inhibition of part of their interaction, in the resistant T790M mutant EGFR
